Content: The Bakmaha Divuruma organized on behalf of a drugs free country will be given on the day after tomorrow. The function will be held under the patronage of President Maithripala Sirisena. The prime purpose of the event is to rally the people against the use of drugs. The Bak Maha Divurama will take place on Wednesday the 03rd, with the participation of school children countrywide and the active contribution of heads and employees of all State, Corporation and Statutory Boards representing national, provincial, district and regional levels. Arrangements have been made to hold the function at the Colombo Independence Square under the auspices of President Maithripala Sirisena at 8.30 am. The Government has invited everyone to give this pledge on the same day at the same time in its effort to make the country free from drugs.
